product_name: Nikwax TX-Direct Spray-On Water Repellent Treatment - 16 oz.
long_description: Apply Nikwax TX-Direct spray-on water repellent treatment to revive water repellency without adversely effecting the garment's breathability. Works well on most fabrics and fabric laminates such as REI Elements(R), Gore-Tex(R), Ultrex(R), Entrant(TM), Permatex(TM), SympaTex(R) and eVent(TM). Ideal for garments with wicking linings, synthetic sleeping bags and items that shouldn't be machine washed, such as single-wall tents and bivy sacks. Quick and easy to apply; can be used anywhere, anytime, on either wet or dry fabrics.
short_description: Apply Nikwax TX-Direct spray-on water repellent treatment to revive water repellency without adversely effecting the garment's breathability.
